snippet: The Voting Rights Act of 1965 would be modernized under a bipartisan bill introduced in Congress on Thursday in response to the Supreme Court ruling last year that gutted a core part of the law.
abstract: Voting Rights Act of 1965 will be modernized under a bipartisan bill introduced in Congress in response to the 2013 Supreme Court ruling that gutted a core part of the law.
lead_paragraph: The Voting Rights Act of 1965 would be modernized under a bipartisan bill introduced in Congress on Thursday in response to the Supreme Court ruling last year that gutted a core part of the law.

headline.main: Bill Would Modernize Voting Rights Act
headline.print_headline: Bill Would Modernize Voting Rights Act
